title: Kuroneko Kareshi no Arukikata
original_name: クロネコ彼氏のあるき方
sinopse:
After reconciling and reaffirming their love for one another, Shingo and Keiichi continue their passionate romance. Everything was going swimmingly until a troublesome person from Shingo's past reappears and disrupts their family outing...

(Source: MU)
